analysis.description:
DemeterCrowdsale.endBlock (/unique_chucks/25/0x31919e139a2688da420ef73195b7751951058384.sol#474-475) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.endBlock (/unique_chucks/25/0x31919e139a2688da420ef73195b7751951058384.sol#39)

Reentrancy in FinalizableCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/25/0x31919e139a2688da420ef73195b7751951058384.sol#354-360):
	External calls:
	- finalization() (/unique_chucks/25/0x31919e139a2688da420ef73195b7751951058384.sol#359)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/25/0x31919e139a2688da420ef73195b7751951058384.sol#359-360)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x31919e139a2688da420ef73195b7751951058384.sol#86-103) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0x31919e139a2688da420ef73195b7751951058384.sol#97-102)

BonusWhiteListCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x31919e139a2688da420ef73195b7751951058384.sol#175-189) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,bonusTokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0x31919e139a2688da420ef73195b7751951058384.sol#185-187)

BonusReferrerCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x31919e139a2688da420ef73195b7751951058384.sol#227-243) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,bonusReferredTokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0x31919e139a2688da420ef73195b7751951058384.sol#232)
	-token.mint(referrals[beneficiary],bonusReferrerTokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0x31919e139a2688da420ef73195b7751951058384.sol#233-238)

PartialOwnershipCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x31919e139a2688da420ef73195b7751951058384.sol#254-276) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(wallet,companyTokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0x31919e139a2688da420ef73195b7751951058384.sol#271-272)

FinalizableCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/25/0x31919e139a2688da420ef73195b7751951058384.sol#365-367) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/25/0x31919e139a2688da420ef73195b7751951058384.sol#365-367)
